review: My bro in-law got treated wid dr. Mao. ********* ******* explains everything properly. **** ****** * **** **** *******

My mother had chest pain so went to hospital. Doctor was good. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Medical tests were done. There was waiting time in the hospital when we went. Diet was suggested to my mom. Doctor was friendly.

May Almighty give him time & strength  to serve more & more of patients to live a healthy life.
